subject: Re: [junit] [Q] Using "golden files" with JUnit

messageBody:
search google for: junit fileassert
it brought back a promising looking sourceforge page for me

-------------- Original message --------------
Hi Joe,

Thanks for the response.

This sounds silly, but I have not been able to find
one
anywhere. Do yo mind sending me the URL where I can
download
this addon from ?

Regards

- Soumendra Daaas

Would appreciatte your help on this.
>
> I believe that junit-addons has a FileAssert class.
>

> task, I can't believe

> line of code.
